attributes.action: restrict engine power output for new car drivers during the first years of passing the driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a similar way to motorcyclists, it would be of benefit to a new car driver to experience driving first with a low powered vehicle.  The knock-on effects would include: a reduction in accidents, reduced insurance claims and reduced drains on NHS resources.  Ultimately, our roads will become safer for all.
